Created an attachment (id=69518)
Patch

Please apply this patch.

One observation on Linux platform is made that while specifying EPR for Profiling, Source Tab didn't get modified while modifying the Design Tab (it didn't modify the URI specified in Design Tab, but it update the Source for Reference Parameters). So the workaround is that to provide the URI for EPR by modifying the Source Tab.
This patch has been tested on both (Windows and Linux) platform and a manual test case has been added to test the complete end-to-end functionality of tooling on Linux.

Created an attachment (id=69729)
Test case for E2E tooling test on Linux
Test case added to Monitor.UI.WSDM_Tooling_Editor_MRT.testsuite to test E2E endpoint creation with the tooling on Linux
Patch from 5/31 and additional test case checked in. QA please verify.
